com.tencent.mm.opensdk.modelmsg

类 WXMediaMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tencent.mm.opensdk.modelmsg.WXMediaMessage

  • public final class WXMediaMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Contents of WeChat media message
    微信媒体消息内容

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明

      Builder for WXMediaMessage
      WXMediaMessage构造器

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String ACTION_WXAPPMESSAGE
      Default ACTION of WeChat media message
      微信媒体消息的默认ACTION
      java.lang.String description
      Message description

      NOTE: The length should be within 1KB.
      WXMediaMessage.IMediaObject mediaObject
      Used to describe base classes of a media object, which can be WXTextObject, WXImageObject, WXMusicObject, WXVideoObject, WXWebpageObject, WXFileObject, WXAppExtendObject WXFileObject, WXAppExtendObject
      用于描述一个媒体对象的基类，媒体对象包括 WXTextObject, WXImageObject, WXMusicObject, WXVideoObject, WXWebpageObject, WXFileObject, WXAppExtendObject, WXMiniProgramObject
      java.lang.String mediaTagName 
      java.lang.String messageAction 
      java.lang.String messageExt 
      int sdkVer
      SDK version number
      sdk版本号
      byte[] thumbData
      Binary data of a thumbnail image

      NOTE: The file size should be within 32KB.
      java.lang.String title
      Message title

      NOTE: The length should be within 512Bytes

      消息标题

      注意：限制长度不超过512Bytes
